thread.title: We Have Two Reasons Why You Should See A Movie This Weekend
thread.title_full: We Have Two Reasons Why You Should See A Movie This Weekend

title: We Have Two Reasons Why You Should See A Movie This Weekend
text: We Have Two Reasons Why You Should See A Movie This Weekend By Clip Syndicate Movie buffs, you will definitely want to head to Landmark Cinemas this weekend. The buzz around the two films debuting on Friday has been amazing. Here to share more about them is our resident movie critic, Zach Washburn, General Manager for Landmark Cinemas.
